name: Severed Innocence
desc2: Equip to increase Attack Agents' combat capabilities

phase.name: Tranquil Blossom
phase.desc: CRIT DMG is increased by <color=#2BAD00>30%</color>. When the equipper lands a hit with a <color=#FFFFFF>Basic Attack</color>, <color=#FFFFFF>Special Attack</color>, or <color=#FFFFFF>Aftershock</color>, they gain 1 stack of a buff. Each stack increases the equipper's CRIT DMG by an additional <color=#2BAD00>10%</color>, stacking up to 3 times. The effect lasts for 30s, with each stack's duration calculated separately, and can only be triggered once per use of a skill. With all 3 stacks, the equipper's <color=#2EB6FF>Electric DMG</color> increases by <color=#2BAD00>20%</color>.
